name: captions
title: Captions
summary: Learn how to upload a caption file and perform in-video searches

steps.title: Select a Media Entry
steps.description: Choose a video from your library to add captions to.

steps.title: Uploading Captions - Create an Upload Token
steps.description:
Use the uploadToken service to upload an SRT file to the Kaltura API. If you don't have an SRT file handy, you can [download one here](/sample_captions.srt)

First you'll need to use `uploadToken.add` to create a new upload token. In the next step we'll use this token to upload the SRT data.

steps.title: Uploading Captions - Send the SRT Data
steps.description: Now we'll use the newly created Upload Token to upload the SRT. If you don't have an SRT file handy, you can [download one here](/sample_captions.srt)

steps.title: Creating a new Caption Asset
steps.description: Next you'll need to create a Caption Asset, which describes the format, language, and label of your captions.

steps.title: Setting Caption Content
steps.description: Now that you've created a new Caption Asset you need to associate it with the caption file you uploaded using the `captionAsset.setContent` method

steps.title: Searching through Captions
steps.description: You can use ```captionAssetItem.search``` to search for scenes within your videos.
